statements: UPDATE GentrificationImpact SET median_house_price = 200000, gentrification_factor = 0.75 WHERE city_name = 'New York';
UPDATE GentrificationImpact SET gentrification_factor = 0.80, median_house_price = 180000 WHERE city_id = 2;
UPDATE GentrificationImpact SET median_house_price = 500000, gentrification_factor = 0.75 WHERE city_id = 1;
UPDATE GentrificationImpact SET gentrification_factor = 0.85, city_name = 'New City' WHERE city_id = 2;
UPDATE impact_of_gentrification SET gentrification_level = 2, neighborhood = 'Downtown' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE gentrification_trends SET trend_description = 'Increasing trend in real estate prices' WHERE trend_id = 3;
UPDATE impact_of_gentrification SET housing_price = 120000.50, gentrification_level = 3 WHERE city = 'New York' AND neighborhood = 'Brooklyn';
UPDATE gentrification_trends SET trend_description = 'Rapidly changing landscape due to new development projects' WHERE city = 'San Francisco' AND trend_year = 2022;
UPDATE housing_prices SET price = 150000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE gentrification SET impact_rating = 9 WHERE id = 4;
UPDATE housing_prices SET price = 150000.00 WHERE city = 'New York' AND neighborhood = 'Manhattan' AND year = 2021
UPDATE demographics SET median_income = 75000.00, population = 5000 WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND neighborhood = 'Hollywood'
UPDATE housing_prices SET avg_price = 50000 WHERE location = 'New York' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE demographic_data SET population = 1000000, year = 2022 WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE housing_prices SET avg_price = 150000.75, year = 2022 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE economic_data SET income = 75000.50, employment_rate = 85.25 WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND year = 2021;
UPDATE urban_areas SET gentrification_status='Undergoing gentrification' WHERE area_id=1;
UPDATE housing_prices SET price=150000 WHERE property_id=3;
UPDATE urban_areas SET city_name = 'New City', gentrification_status = 'Undergoing Gentrification' WHERE area_id = 1;
UPDATE demographics SET total_population = 15000, median_income = 75000.50 WHERE area_id = 3;
